Articles.Content:
The AstroNut's Airliner

Description:

A Cumbersome Airliner... jeb hates flying this thing... he said he's scared of safe aircraft.

Specs:


4 x Ram Intakes
2 x Circular Intakes
2 x Jet Engines
2 x massive airliner like wings
1 x lots of fuel
2 x breaking parachutes
3 x navigation lights
1 x ladder

Engines are powerful enough to go ballistic (straight up) without stalling. The wings are extremely durable (only time they have ever broken off for me is when I clipped one of the lights at the end of the runway with my wing while going 150 m/s). Top Speed is ~230 m/s at 5000 m. May be able to fly nonstop around kerbin but unlikely.

Action Groups:

Abort: Apply breaks and deploy parachute

Stage: Turn on navigational lights

Action Group 9 (key 9): deploy parachutes

Action Group 10 (key 0): cut parachutes

-->Airliner.craft<--

Edited April 26, 2014 by TheAstronut
